channel.title: Game crashes after 15-20 minutes of gameplay
channel.description: This is exclusively in multiplayer to my knowledge, as I've not played singleplayer yet. Apparently dump file's .dmp file extension is invalid here so I'll upload to mediafire I guess. Here's a link to my dump files: [url]https://www.mediafire.com/folder/trlf4tak9h83q/BM_Steam_Crashes[/url]

item.title: Game crashes after 15-20 minutes of gameplay
item.dc:creator: DaftMink
item.description:
These rather timely crashes happen for me as well, along with the missing weapon models, and rendering error messages.

Specs:
CPU: Intel I7 4771 3.5 GHz Quad Hyper threaded
GPU: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 - 2GB VRAM
RAM: 2x4GB 1600mhz DIMMs

Also if I might add a few scoreboard suggestions.

  1. Add the current map name
  2. Add total player count per team

Read full topic
item.source: Game crashes after 15-20 minutes of gameplay
